definition: to throw off/to abandon/to cast off/to get rid of/to dump
to throw/to fling/to swing/to leave behind/to throw off/to dump (sb)

to fall/to drop/to lag behind/to lose/to go missing/to reduce/fall (in prices)/to lose (value, weight etc)/to wag/to swing/to turn/to change/to exchange/to swap/to show off/to shed (hair)/(used after certain verbs to express completion, fulfillment, removal etc)

sentences.english: The cells may also lose or inactivate the tumor suppressor gene PTEN.
sentences.chinese: 癌細胞也可能甩掉或關閉腫瘤抑制基因PTEN。

sentences.english: As soon as he saw me, he took one hard draw on the cigarette and flicked it away.
sentences.chinese: 他看到我，就猛吸了最後一口煙，甩掉菸頭。

sentences.english: He put his hand on her shoulder,but she threw it off angrily.
sentences.chinese: 他把手放在他的肩上，但她生氣地將他的手甩掉。

sentences.english: Most people who do exercise to lose their beer belly usually only work on belly exercises.
sentences.chinese: 很多靠運動來甩掉啤酒肚的人通常只做腹部運動。

sentences.english: Day 176: I'll try to shake him at the next intersection.
sentences.chinese: 在下個路口我會想辦法甩掉他的。

sentences.english: After 30 seasons, he dumped his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他在姻緣30年後，甩掉了他的妻子。

sentences.english: The last shirt your wise man will abandon is pride. ---- J. D. Mariana .
sentences.chinese: 聰明人最後應該甩掉的外衣是驕傲。

sentences.english: She shed the pounds by first ditching unhealthy trans-fats, and increasing the number of times per week that she exercised.
sentences.chinese: 她先是甩掉不健康脂肪，然後每週增加鍛鍊次數。

sentences.english: I am so sorry for ditching you. How can I make it up to you?
sentences.chinese: 我真不該甩掉你。我該怎麼補償你呢？

sentences.english: Three people to get rid of the Japanese iron tiger.
sentences.chinese: 甩掉了日軍的鐵虎三人趕到。

sentences.english: After 30 years, he dumped his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他在結婚30年後，甩掉了他的妻子。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, Hamlin could not be completely dislodged from public office.
sentences.chinese: 不過不能完全把哈姆林從公職甩掉。

sentences.english: I really blew up when I heard that my girlfriend wants to brush me off .
sentences.chinese: 當我聽說我的女朋友想甩掉我的時候，我真火了。

sentences.english: NO02,3. I've dropped thirteen kilos over the last six months.
sentences.chinese: 過去六個月我甩掉十三公斤。

sentences.english: Lay down this bent drill pipe.

definition: to shake off/to get rid of
to throw/to fling/to swing/to leave behind/to throw off/to dump (sb)
to break away from/to cast off (old ideas etc)/to get rid of/to break away (from)/to break out (of)/to free oneself from/to extricate oneself
to run away/to take to one's heels
to remove/to take off/to strip off/to discard/to shed/to come off/to fall off
wrapping cloth/a bundle wrapped in cloth/load/weight/burden/funny part/punchline
to throw down/to dump/to abandon/thrown down

to fall/to drop/to lag behind/to lose/to go missing/to reduce/fall (in prices)/to lose (value, weight etc)/to wag/to swing/to turn/to change/to exchange/to swap/to show off/to shed (hair)/(used after certain verbs to express completion, fulfillment, removal etc)
to lose/to throw away/to discard/to cast away
to stay out of (hot water, trouble, awkward situation etc)/to avoid (sb)
to cast far from oneself/to leave sb far behind/to outdistance
